item.title: Alaska snow cloaks JBER
item.dc:creator: bloodyshotme
item.excerpt:encoded: U.S. Air Force Col. Mark Schmidt, Alaskan Command J3 director of operations, uses a snowblower to remove snow after the first heavy snowfall of the season at Joint Base Elmendorf-Richardson, Alaska, Dec. 13, 2018. (U.S. Air Force photo by Staff Sgt. Curt Beach)

item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

item.title: Home Page
item.dc:creator: bloodyshotme
item.content:encoded:
Stay Safe and Snow-Free This Winter

Fast and reliable snow removal for driveways, walkways, and entrances keeping your home clear, accessible, and worry-free all winter long.

Book your service today

Our professional landscaping team keeps your outdoor space beautiful, healthy, and maintained all year long.

Why choose us

We are a local winter service team dedicated to keeping homes safe, accessible, and snow-free throughout the cold season. With reliable response times, proper equipment, and attention to detail, we make winter easier for homeowners who dont want to shovel, struggle with ice, or worry about slippery walkways.
Eco Friendly
Eco-friendly methods and quality materials!
About us
Services

Explore Our Wide Range Of Services

Get in touch

Snow Removal

Fast and reliable clearing of driveways, walkways, and entrances to keep your property safe and accessible.

Roof & Gutter Snow Clearing

Fast and reliable clearing of driveways, walkways, and entrances to keep your property safe and accessible.

Ice Management

We apply salt and de-icing treatments to prevent slippery surfaces and reduce risk of accidents.

Lighting Setup

Professional installation of festive outdoor lighting to make your home look bright and welcoming. Portfolio

Our Past Winter Projects

contact

Get In Touch To Maintain Your Property Starting Today

Get in touch
"Professional, reliable, and detail-oriented highly recommend!" Jane Bloom Toronto, ON
Get in touch
Any Weather
Whole-winter coverage with one trusted team! Process

Our Process Is Simple and Effective

Get in touch
Contact Us
Reach out by phone, form, or email and tell us what services you need for your property.
STEP 01
STEP 02
Appointment
We visit your location, assess the space, and confirm a clear plan and quote.
STEP 03
Enjoy the Results
Our team completes the work , leaving your outdoor area clean, safe, and looking great. testimonials

What Our Last 5 Clients Say

Get in touch

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: bloodyshotme
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://snow-removal.local.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: bloodyshotme
item.content:encoded:
20+ employees 3 regions 700+ projects done 9 winters

Your Top Choice for Property Maintenance in Toronto

Snow No More is a dedicated snow-removal service built to keep homes clear, safe, and accessible all winter long. We combine reliable scheduling, fast response times, and professional equipment to handle even the toughest storms. Our goal is simple: make winter effortless for you.
Get in touch
"Professional, reliable, and detail-oriented highly recommend!" Jane Bloom Toronto, ON Benefits

Why They Choose Us

24/7 Availability

Were always here to tackle your snow removal needs.

PRO Equipment

Equipped with state-of-the-art machinery.

100% Insured

Rest easy knowing were licensed and fully insured.

Consistent Quality

Every job is done thoroughly, not rushed.

Flexible Options

Seasonal plans or on-demand service.

Local & Trusted

Built for the community, not a generic chain.

Ready for a winter without shoveling? Request a Quote!

We use professional-grade snow blowers, plows, shovels, and eco-friendly ice treatments to ensure effective results without damaging your property. Safety is our priority for you and your home. Book your snow removal service today and enjoy peace of mind all season.
Get in touch

Where We Work

Service Areas

Toronto

York Region

Peel Region

Halton Region

team

Meet Our Crew Members

Andrew Lark

Owner

Mathew Brom

Property Specialist

Kris Geralt

Property Specialist Services

Explore Our Wide Range Of Services

Get in touch

Snow Removal

Fast and reliable clearing of driveways, walkways, and entrances to keep your property safe and accessible.

Roof & Gutter Snow Clearing

Fast and reliable clearing of driveways, walkways, and entrances to keep your property safe and accessible.

Ice Management

We apply salt and de-icing treatments to prevent slippery surfaces and reduce risk of accidents.

Lighting Setup

Professional installation of festive outdoor lighting to make your home look bright and welcoming.

Winter shouldnt slow you down and we make sure it doesnt.

Fast and reliable snow removal for driveways, walkways, and entrances keeping your home clear, accessible, and worry-free all winter long.
Get in Touch

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: bloodyshotme
item.content:encoded:
We Look Forward To Hearing From You

Contact our office at (416) 555-5555 or info@snownomore.ca at your earliest convenience to learn more about the services we offer.  Residential and Commercial customers are always welcome.

Together, the Best Make It Happen. We are Snow No More.

Contact Info

Earthbound Maintenance (Office) 250 Eddystone Ave North York, ON M3N 1H7 (437) 555 5555 info@nomoresnow.com

Services

Snow Removal
Ice Management
Lightning Installation
Roof & Gutter Snow Clearing
